info.title: Karate Math Dojo
info.description:
Learn karate while practicing math facts, with Sensei Sugaku's Karate Math Dojo, a 2D-fighter style game.
Go from learning basic martial arts moves, to competing in tournaments, fighting ninjas and saving your sensei from pirates, all while learning elementary-level math. Perfect for the K-5 student in your house, or just for fun.

controls: 使用鼠标点击进行操作
instructions.howToPlay: 按照游戏内提示进行游戏，完成各种挑战任务。
